title: Steller's Albatross
marks:
Signature, Date, Edition and Chop

See signed an at LRC, in pencil: [18/50 F. Stella \'77]
description: off-white paper with grid/graph printed in green in background; two large yellow curved shapes at center with pink square behind; teal and orange curved shape to R; pink horizontal, slightly curved rectangle at bottom; a few other colored shapes throughout; light green/cream rectangular background border; silver rectangle in background behind many shapes; behind Plexiglas in silver wood frame with stepped edges
